title: Requires that prior to a contract with the state or other public entity being effective, a report must be filed with the comptroller disclosing financial interests
summary: Requires that prior to a contract with the state or other public entity being effective, a report must be filed with the comptroller disclosing financial interests.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3331

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. BRENNAN, CLARK, ROSENTHAL, HOYT, GALEF, CASTRO,
         CAHILL, COLTON -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M.  of  A.  GABRYSZAK,  MAGEE,
         MAISEL,  MILLMAN, PERRY, PHEFFER, SWEENEY, WEISENBERG -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Corporations, Authorities and Commissions

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities  law,  in  relation  to  contract
         reports

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The public authorities law  is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 2881 to read as follows:
    3    S 2881. REPORTING OF CONTRACTS TO THE COMPTROLLER. PRIOR TO AWARDING A
    4  CONTRACT  REQUIRING  THE  PAYMENT  OF APPROPRIATED MONIES TO ANY PERSON,
    5  FIRM, PARTNERSHIP OR CORPORATION, EVERY STATE AUTHORITY, LOCAL  AUTHORI-
    6  TY,  INTERSTATE  OR  INTERNATIONAL  AUTHORITY OR AFFILIATE OR SUBSIDIARY
    7  THEREOF SHALL REPORT TO THE COMPTROLLER: (I) THE NAME OF THE CONTRACTOR;
    8  (II) THE AMOUNT OF THE CONTRACT; (III) THE PURPOSE OF THE CONTRACT; (IV)
    9  THE NAME OF THE MEMBER OF THE LEGISLATURE WHO  SPONSORED  THE  APPROPRI-
   10  ATION  OF  SUCH MONIES OR THE ALLOCATION OF A PORTION OF SUCH MONIES FOR
   11  SUCH CONTRACT; AND (V) A SWORN STATEMENT SIGNED UNDER OATH BY THE EXECU-
   12  TIVE DIRECTOR OR PRINCIPAL OFFICER OF THE CONTRACTOR, OF  ANY  FINANCIAL
   13  INTEREST SUCH MEMBER OF THE LEGISLATURE, OR A RELATIVE OF SUCH MEMBER OF
   14  THE  LEGISLATURE  HAS IN THE PERSON, FIRM, PARTNERSHIP OR CORPORATION TO
   15  WHOM OR TO WHICH SUCH CONTRACT IS AWARDED SUBMITTED ON A FORM AS  DETER-
   16  MINED BY THE COMPTROLLER. NO SUCH CONTRACT SHALL BE EFFECTIVE UNTIL SUCH
   17  REPORT  IS FILED WITH THE COMPTROLLER. FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS SECTION,
   18  "RELATIVE" OF ANY INDIVIDUAL SHALL MEAN ANY PERSON LIVING  IN  THE  SAME
   19  HOUSEHOLD  AS THE INDIVIDUAL OR ANY PERSON WHO IS A DIRECT DESCENDANT OF
   20  THAT INDIVIDUAL'S GRANDPARENTS OR THE SPOUSE OF SUCH DESCENDANT.
   21    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00848-01-1
